title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Minister for Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public Service Reform and 
Digitalisation) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister public expenditure infrastructure public service reform digitalisation) order 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Sam Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Sam Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public Service 
Reform and Digitalisation, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister 
for Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public Service Reform and Digitalisation, 
with effect from 23 January 2025.
text_norm: 2 sam griffin particular whose address deposited office department public expenditure infrastructure public service reform digitalisation appointed special adviser minister public expenditure infrastructure public service reform digitalisation effect 23 january 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 3. Shane Smyth, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Shane Smyth, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public Service 
Reform and Digitalisation, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister 
for Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public Service Reform and Digitalisation, 
with effect from 23 January 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

24 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [290] 3
